name: ARDELIA
description:
ARDELIA was made with watercolor media and a few colored pencil strokes and acrylic paints. Made on arches coldpress 200gsm paper with A2 size (420x594mm). 

This is one of the larger painting works that I have made so far.

Through working on this painting I just thought that I enjoyed doing it and enjoyed every bit of process in this art work. Using my favorite colors, the object I like, mix and match it with pleasure.

I also think that every work of art which creates into the world is the epitome of personal life experience of each artist.

With Love,
STAVEZE

-

Watercolor painting on Arches CP 200gsm A2
3580 × 2448 Pixel

Personal Use Only
